Definition: In this task, you will be given an app review. Your task is to determine whether the sentiment expressed in the review is "Positive" or "Negative".

Positive Examples.input: Fantastic app! When I connect my BT headset  I have it set to read important notifications - add that to Google Now's                 ability to create texts  reminders and calendar events  and my $20 headset has all the functionality of a smartwatch.                     Kudos to the developer!
Positive Examples.explanation: There is an expression of happiness in this text. Hence, it is Positive

Positive Examples.explanation: There is an expression of sadness and anger in this text. Hence, it is Negative

Instances.input: Does not work I can not get out of settings

This version (0.9.8) is terribly outdated. I did not notice until it stopped working after the Android 7 update. The version on F-Droid (0.11.7) works  has an updated interface and also features automatic reconnection.
This thing is great. I am at the bottom of the learning curve but in the few minutes I have played with it it seems like it will be easy to learn and to use. Just what I hoped for.

Fantastic app! When I connect my BT headset  I have it set to read important notifications - add that to Google Now's ability to create texts  reminders and calendar events  and my $20 headset has all the functionality of a smartwatch. Kudos to the developer!
Nice Work Wish it could transmit too on Hack
Works on Motorola Droid Mini. Very cool app. I would like to try and DF power line noise using this app coupled with the RTL-SDR dongle. nice job on the app!
Awsome App! Easy to use  works great on Notes w / Realtek dongle.
